author: pquerna
msg: Add a new feature to aggregate_buckets, which allows them to notify an external callback when its list of buckets is now empty, instead of returning APR_EOF.  This fixes SSL pipelining for now, though signifigant rethough into the writing to the server stream needs to be done.

author: pquerna
msg: Remove debugging line that snuck into the last commit.

author: pquerna
msg: Use barrier buckets to fix pipelining of non-SSL requests again, by re-setting up the connection level aggregate buckets as needed.

author: pquerna
msg: Add default snapshot functions for the SSL Encryption bucket.

author: pquerna
msg: * serfmake: Add new files to build.
